This game use to be fun, but just got harder and harder for the survivors. Please balance the game out.
Quick PSA:  Specifically targeting players using the "PRIDE" charm falls under "targeted harassment" Anyone who chooses to do so WILL BE PUNISHED.
A Steve stood infront of me to block my knife from hitting a gen. I have vowed never to harm a Steve again.
El juego es bueno, tiene sus bugs pero si vas con tus amigos puedes disfrutar de uno que otro susto, campeo y a veces, si tienes suerte un tuneleo sabroson.
Games got bugs and communities toxic, yet the games fun and the community is cool. cant ask for much more

Don't play this game. Don't buy it, don't think about it, just don't. For your sanity and health do not play it. This game is a mess of bad design, outdated code, blatant cheaters, bugs that have persisted since 2016, long queue times for killers, and core gameplay that is specifically designed to enrage players on both sides, especially killer.

The developers do not care about this game. you spend 9/10 games glitching around and getting hit by shots that obviously missed on both parties screens, pallets do not drop when the button to do so is pressed, and window vaults are broken as heck. Don't pick this game up as you will constantly chase the high to have a fair game, but you will never be satisfied.

It's a fun game. I spent many hours playing it and finding new ways to play the killers is interesting. The survivors are pretty much skins for you to use since the perks can be given to other survivors after you level that survivor to 40+ (Maybe 45+?). It's been a hot minute since I touched it, but the memories I have of playing this game are great. I think the biggest downfall is the repetitive nature that a game like Dead by Daylight eventually runs into. It doesn't have much depth to it, but it's definitely better enjoyed with company.

This game is full of the most toxic players you'll ever play against. Developers won't do anything against them. 
I still play occasionally, with friends. When it's not against (and with) randoms, the games are fun.
Against randoms, it basically relies on one side stomping the other to have fun, and I've found their garbage matchmaking always stacks you against some tryhard you've got no chance against unless you're playing with friends on voice chat, and even then, probably not. I once didn't escape for two and a half hours' worth of games with survivor friends STRAIGHT.
yes i wood buy this game it is very fun
Man this game bussin straight bussin poggers tastes just like Gordon Ramseys hamburgers very pog. It's like the butter on butter dog its a must have.

Pretty fun game, 25 quite Killers all with their own unique playstyles. Regardless of whether or not they're good they all have fun in store. Survivor gameplay isn't as fun by yourself so bring a friend and get on Discord. Each one has plenty of perks to make a million different combinations to suit your playstyle.
Hard learning curve when you get to higher ranks but it's a really fun game overall
could play for a long period of time... it takes a good game for me to do that buy yea its a really good game
very fun, can be toxic but what game isnt
If You love Hate Games You'll Love this LUL
This is actually the worst game ever idk why i keep making myself suffer. *readies up again*
The game is great really fun to play especially with friends, can be a little toxic sometimes tho ;)

fun game with friends but definitely challenging as a solo player. the fact that communicating with your teammates as a solo player relies on being able to know where your teammates are. the game is well made with only certain glitches that actually can be game breaking which obviously get reported. 

game mechanics and graphics are somewhat smooth, and you don't need the best specs to run it. the game is original and has a really interesting lore that goes with it with fresh content given consistently. 100% recommend trying out if you ever have a friend group with 4 people.
